scripts.build: rimraf lib && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && node --input-type=module -e "import { existsSync } from 'node:fs'; if (!existsSync('lib/index.js')) { console.error('Missing lib/index.js after build'); process.exit(2); }"
scripts.build:resilient: npm run build || (npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --prefer-online && npm run build)
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions --project mybodyscan-f3daf
